title: SOLD: Cobb, bat off, Polar Bear
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: SOLD: Cobb, bat off, Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Maybe we've reached the peak of Cobb prices, and maybe we haven't, but if you're looking for a low-grade Cobb with good eye appeal, especially if you like tobacco stains and rounded corners, look no further.

SOLD
